casebody.data:
No. 10-76. Goodyear Dunlop Tires Operations, S.A., et al., Petitioners v. Edgar D. Brown, et ux., Co-Administrators of the Estate of Julian David Brown, et al. 562 U.S. 1127, 131 S. Ct. 858,

178 L. Ed. 2d 621,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7. January 7, 2011.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
